title: Volleyball for beginners. Part one. The game
creator_credit: Sports Films, Brian M. Williams and Alan Simpson
brief_description: Comments on the rise in popularity of volleyball since it became an Olympic sport. The National Volleyball Team demonstrates the basic techniques: positions on court, volleying, heading practice, service, receiving and spiking. The importance of teamwork and drills for improving reactions are shown and a short game is played.
